name: geojson2svg
description: Converts geojson to svg/path string given svg viewport size and maps extent.

0.0.7.name: geojson2svg
0.0.7.description: Converts geojson to svg/path string given svg viewport size and maps extent.

scripts.build-debug: browserify src/main.js --debug --standalone geojson2svg | exorcist dist/geojson2svg.js.map > dist/geojson2svg.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min
